datoCmsKey.name: Maggie Mae Sulentic
datoCmsKey.bio: **Maggie Mae Sulentic (she/her)** is a musical theatre performer/scenic designer based in Minneapolis, Minnesota. She graduated with a BA in Theatre from Luther and now makes a healthy living playing villains and strong female characters who definitely donâ€™t need any men. Outside of her theatrical work she also works on TV sets and makes Minnesota shaped stuff out of wood for the insatiable Minnesota Shaped Wooden Stuff market. Her passions include hot sauce, horror movies and queer content.
